text: This week, @HouseDemocrats will vote on and pass two life-saving pieces of gun violence prevention legislation: the Protecting Our Children Act and the Federal Extreme Risk Protection Order Act. It's time to #EndGunViolence. https://t.co/WHuY1J0ASe

Thank you to the talented scientists who worked so hard on this report, which is more comprehensive than ever, accounting for the Chesapeake’s economic, ecological and societal factors for the first time. 3/3

As an @AppropsDems, I am proud to have secured vital federal resources that will help us move closer to the goalpost and bring home that A-plus rating we all desire. We all must recommit ourselves to the health and prosperity of the Chesapeake Bay. 2/3

Attended the release of @UMCES annual report card on the #ChesapeakeBay. The Bay’s overall health is moving in the right direction and a little progress each day adds up to big results. Certainly we have a lot more work to do to save the Bay and the livelihoods it supports. 1/3 https://t.co/UXb9X4EgEW

Everyone deserves the chance to pursue higher education opportunities. #TeamMaryland is proud to deliver $3.7+M for local colleges + universities across the state to help underrepresented Marylanders enter + complete higher education degree programs. https://t.co/fFjg8hlzMP

Today and every day, I’m thankful for the selfless heroes who stormed the beaches in Normandy during the Allied #DDay invasion 78 years ago. May we never forget their courage or take for granted their sacrifices. https://t.co/okZxyMdNRc

.@AmeriCorps members play a vital role in MD – providing crucial assistance and care to communities across our state. Today #TeamMaryland announced over $7M to further support these service and volunteerism efforts to improve Marylanders' quality of life. https://t.co/jakwaODTbt

Too many lives have been lost to gun violence in America. Thoughts and prayers are not enough. As we remember the victims of gun violence today on Gun Violence Awareness Day, I am calling on Republicans to join with Democrats on common-sense gun legislation to #EndGunViolence. https://t.co/VgjnYYENGr

Happy #Pride Month! As we celebrate the resilience of our nation’s LGBTQI+ community and honor the trailblazers who have bravely fought to live authentically, may we continue to advance equality for all. Everyone deserves to love who they love openly and freely. https://t.co/9R5LbFEm7G
